name: Hpi_location_type
title: Location Type
description: A coded value for location type.

concept.definition: A Hospital Campus offering inpatient, outpatient and daypatient services run by a DHB
A DHB hospital department or ward (not otherwise specified)
A DHB unit that is independent of a specific hospital eg PHU or Admin office
Internal Pharmacy Associated with DHB Hospital
A Laboratory run by a DHB
An outreach or immunisation clinic run by a DHB
A facility offering inpatient, outpatient and daypatient mental health services run by a DHB
Home Birth services as managed by DHBs
DHB maternity services - including maternity units and support for LMC/midwives.
DHB emergency Departments.
Facility Ids allocated to DHB Cancer registrars
A place where a DHB provides Public Health advice and programs in an office setting.
A facility offering inpatient, outpatient and daypatient services run by a Private Health Group or Trust
A private hospital department or ward (not otherwise specified)
Internal Pharmacy
A facility where surgical procedures are performed - no overnight stays
Includes Retirement Villages, Rest Homes and any associated Hospital and or Dementia units.
A place where primary care services are provided by a General Practitioner  who is not affiliated to a PHO
A place where primary care services are provided to enrolled patients by a General Practitioner

concept.display: Community based clinical service facility - unspecified
concept.definition: A place where unspecified services are provided in an office environment
A place where services are provided by a registered nurse in an office setting
A health clinic run by a branch of the NZ Armed Forces
A place where services are provided to youth in an office setting
A health clinic run by the Department of Corrections
A health clinic in a school or University setting providing services to students
Services provided in a clinical setting by PHO/MSO
A place where sexual health clinics take place
A place that offers screening services

concept.display: Occupational health - including company health clinics
concept.definition: Includes facilities for Occupational Health practitioners
A place where specialist services are provided in an office environment
A place where ENT and Otolaryngology consultations occur
A place where plastic/cosmetic surgery consultations and minor procedures occur.
A place where Orthopaedic consultations occur
A place where Obstetric and Gynaecological services are offered
Facility for Anaesthetists consulting rooms and or base rather than site anaesthesia is performed.
Consultation rooms for surgeons (not otherwise defined)
Facility where Urology consultations Occur
Facility where Cardiologists and Heart Specialists conduct consultations
Facility where Neurologists and Neurology Specialists conduct consultations
Facility where Rheumatology Specialists conduct consultations
Facility where Sports M Specialists conduct consultations
Facility where Oral and Maxillofacial surgeons conduct consultations
Facility where Eye Specialists and Opthalmologists conduct consultations
Facility where Pain and Musculoskeletal Specialists conduct consultations
Facility where Gastroenterologists and Endoscopy Specialists conduct consultations
Facility where Psychiatrists conduct consultations
Facility where Paediatrics Specialists conduct consultations
Facility where Internal medicine, Endocrinologists and Diabetes Specialists conduct consultations
Facility where Oncology Specialists conduct consultations
Historic facilities defined to cater for Private Clinicians in each area
A place where dermatological services - including Skin cancer checks are provided in an office setting
A place where Allergy and Immunology Specialists conduct consultations
A laboratory run by a private health group in a non-hospital setting
A place where a radiology service is provided by a private health group. Includes other imaging and ultrasound
A place where physiotherapy services are provided in an office setting
A place where dental services are provided in an office setting
A place where orthodontic services are provided in a clinical setting
A place where periodontic services are provided in a clinical setting
A place where occupational therapy services are provided in an office setting
A place where pharmacy services are provided in a shop or community health centre
Licensed for storage/use of Pharmacies but not open for dispensing to the public
A place where counselling services are provided in an office setting
Where midwifery services are provided by an independent midwife
A place where services are provided by a psychologist in an office setting
A place where after hours services are provided in a non-hospital setting
A place where chiropractic services are provided in an office setting
A place where osteopathic services are provided in an office setting
A place where family planning services are provided in an office setting
A place where Optometry services are provided in an office or shop setting
A facility providing more than one service
A facility where podiatry services are provided
A place where services specifically related to hands are provided
Audiological services as well as Ear Health.
A place where Chinese medicine services are provided.
A place where Acupuncture services are provided
Includes places where naturopaths, Homeopaths etc provide services
A place where nutrition/dietetic services are provided
A place where services are provided to improve human physical wellness
A placed where Speech Therapy services are provided
A place where Sleep and Respiratory services are provided
A place where mental health services are provided outside a hospital environment
A place where Alcohol, Drug or Addiction services are offered

concept.display: Residential Support / Housing / Respite care facilities
concept.definition: A place where residential support or respite care is provided for mental Health or disabled patients (ie not Aged Care
Includes residential and assisted living facilities
A place where rehabilitation services are provided
A place where paramedics and ambulance staff are based for their provision of Healthcare services.
A place where services are provided by the Plunket Organisation
Services provided in the patients home environment by Nursing Services
A place where services are provided by a Non-Government Organisation
A place where career or work support is provided in an office setting
organisation that supports the provision but does not directly provide health services.
Facilities within MOH - allocated for historical or system purposes
PHO Office or Location involved primarily in management of data
Facility providing Health Services as part of training new practitioners
A place where Covid testing is done
A place for Covid isolation and quarantine
A place where Covid vaccinations are given

purpose: A coded value for location type.
